alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 10 at 4:38PM MST until August 11 at 1:15AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding of the Sacramento Wash caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following county, Mohave. * WHEN...Until 430 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of the Sacramento Wash from Golden Valley to Topock is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 435 PM MST, Heavy rain which fell in Golden Valley has flooded Oatman Highway, and this water will flow down to the Colorado River just north of Interstate 40 overnight. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Oatman Highway. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
